mapper.delete: delete from biz_inv where room_code = #{roomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and inv_date=#{invDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update biz_inv
room_code = #{roomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inv_date = #{invDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inventory = #{inventory,jdbcType=INTEGER},
auto_close = #{autoClose,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creat_by = #{creatBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_update_by = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where room_code = #{roomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from biz_inv where room_code = #{roomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND inv_date = #{invDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select room_code, inv_date, inventory from biz_inv where room_code = #{roomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY inv_date
